pr_title: HBASE-24446 Use EnvironmentEdgeManager to compute clock skew in Master

timeline.message: HBASE-24446 Use EnvironmentEdgeManager to compute clock skew in Master

timeline.body:
@sguggilam looks like import order is incorrect as per checkstyle error:
```
ServerManager.java:86:import com.google.common.annotations.VisibleForTesting;: Wrong order for 'com.google.common.annotations.VisibleForTesting' import. [ImportOrder]
```
Maybe you can put these import in their original place, (could be IDE settings issue)
timeline.bodyHTML:

timeline.author: virajjasani

replies.bodyText: It was using default alphabetical sorting order....imported the hbase import file in eclipse now...fixed and pushed the change
replies.author: sguggilam
